user_query: I'm a fan of League of Legends and I want to know more about the champion 'Volibear'. Can you provide me with the champion's details translated into English? Additionally, recommend a random skin from the knife class in Counter-Strike.

TaskList.description: Fetch the champion details for 'Volibear' from League of Legends.
Translate the champion details of 'Volibear' into English.
Select a random knife skin from Counter-Strike.
